title: Kid Cop Nights
description: Cassidy Kidd is Kid Cop. She’s chasing perps, going undercover, and taking down drug rings. All in a night’s work.
quote: Hey, no fair! It’s way past your bedtime.
altHero: Cassidy Kidd, a young Black girl who is a cop
alt3: Cassidy dressed in French dancer costume, sitting on the hood of a cop car with the chief
